protein.general_function: Involved in transferase activity, transferring glycosyl groups
protein.specific_function: Glycosyltransferase that generates the core 1 O-glycan Gal-beta1-3GalNAc-alpha1-Ser/Thr (T antigen), which is a precursor for many extended O-glycans in glycoproteins. Plays a central role in many processes, such as angiogenesis, thrombopoiesis and kidney homeostasis development.

reference.reference_text: Ju T, Brewer K, D'Souza A, Cummings RD, Canfield WM: Cloning and expression of human core 1 beta1,3-galactosyltransferase. J Biol Chem. 2002 Jan 4;277(1):178-86. Epub 2001 Oct 24.
